title: No information to confirm that Shahrukh Khan is making a film based on the life story of 'Tippu Sultan'
subtitle: There is no information that Shahrukh Khan is in a film based on the life story of 'Tippu Sultan'. The photo of Shahrukh Khan dressed as Tippu Sultan can be seen in a fan-made trailer. The trailer was just made for entertainment purposes only.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post is being shared on social media saying that Shahrukh Khan is acting in a film based on the biography of Tippu Sultan and the film should be boycotted. But FACTLY has found no information to confirm that Shahrukh Khan is acting in a film based on the life story of Tippu Sultan. Also, the photo of Shahrukh Khan as Tippu Sultan in the post can be seen in a fan-made trailer. At the beginning of the trailer, it is explained that the trailer was made for entertainment purposes only and it was made based on editing several video clips available on YouTube.

Did you watch our new video?
